resources.string: SD Maid Pro offers better results, more features and options for power users.
No purchases found. Are you using the right account?
SD Maid has no ads and doesn\'t sell user data. My work is financed by you.

• A motivated developer 🧙
• Improved results 💯
• Scheduled operations ⏰
• Extra options for all tools ⚙️
• Your own deletion rules ✍️
and more…
You can chose between an one-time purchase and a yearly subscription. The in-app purchase breaks even after %1$s years. The subscription starts with a free trial.
The subscription is costs around %s per year.
